offerAndAcceptance.offer: Transition services to the Service Recipient as specified in this Agreement.
offerAndAcceptance.acceptance: The Service Recipient hereby accepts the offer for these services under the terms set forth in this Agreement.
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: Both parties acknowledge a meeting of the minds regarding the efficient transition and mutual benefits as outlined herein.

consideration.description: Fees payable for Services under the Transition Service Schedule.

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: Both parties intend to create legal obligations through this Agreement.
contract.legalityOfPurpose: The Agreement is lawful and pertains to the provision of services within the respective corporate statutory frameworks.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: Provision of transition services to support the operations of Mural US post-Separation.
certaintyOfTerms.timeForPerformance: Ongoing throughout the term as defined herein.

contract.consent: Consent is required for any modifications in services and for third-party participation as outlined in Section 5.

durationAndTermination.duration: Two years from the Effective Date.
durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: Both parties may terminate this Agreement for breach or under specific conditions noted in Article VI.
durationAndTermination.renewalTerms: One extension of up to six months may be mutually agreed upon prior to the conclusion of the term.

signatures.declaration: By Iain Brown, SVP, Chief Financial Officer
